title: New free champion rotation: Ezreal, Gnar, Lucian and more!

replies.body:
#A Corporate Matter
**Episode: _A Song of Ocean and Ice.._**

{{champion:150}} "The Freljord is so cold, I hate the cold.."

{{champion:16}} "You hate everything sir."

{{champion:150}} "Not true, I love money."

{{champion:37}} "..."

{{champion:150}} "Yes, and bacon bit stuffed nachos. How much farther did Taliyah say we had to go?"

{{champion:16}} "Not much farther. I must say, I am really proud of you sir. Going through all this hard work so you can unite the four teams. It's a really selfless thing to do."

{{champion:150}} "Taliyah said there would be a great treasure for the Eldertar. So I just want that."

{{champion:267}} "Hello, welcome to the Ocean tribes. We have been expecting you, Eldertar."

{{champion:150}} "Are you my teacher?"

{{champion:163}} "We both are."

{{champion:150}} "Taliyah, I thought you could only move rocks and stuff?"

{{champion:163}} "Don't say and stuff. Just say, Taliyah, I thought you could only move rocks."

{{champion:16}} "So, you are saying you can control water too?"

{{champion:163}} "Oh, no no. Turns out that ice is a lot like a rock. You know how rocks are just like frozen lava? Well, ice is the same way."

{{champion:150}} "So, you are an ocean bender, unless it's hot out?"

{{champion:163}} "Pretty much, at least I got rocks for then."

{{champion:267}} "That is also why I am here. So you can learn all about ice and water. Also, I brought a friend."

{{item:3070}} **"ROAR!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"**

{{champion:16}} "You brought an Ocean Drake, that's so cool."

{{champion:37}} "..."

{{champion:16}} "Yeah, they are my favorite kind too."

{{champion:267}} "Yep, all us master benders get our own elemental dragon."

{{champion:16}} "Oh, how come Taliyah didn't have a mountain one then?"

{{champion:163}} "Turns out being made of stone actually makes you bad at flying. Takes a lot of effort out of the poor guy. So I just told him to stay where he was and keep splitpushing. He is really good at that."

{{champion:267}} "Let's determine how much we need to teach you about ocean bending. What can you do?"

{{champion:150}} "Well, if I move my arm as fast as I can, slightly under the surface of water. It creates this kind of wave effect. It looks really cool and makes me feel powerful."

{{champion:267}} "Anything else?"

{{champion:150}} "Well, I carry around this supercharger with me in my briefcase. Keeps my Phonerang and Moon Boots from dying on long trips like this one. If I drop the charger in water, It can deliver enough electricity to kill everyone within a half mile radius. Don't ask me how I know this."

{{champion:267}} "Ok then. Well, you are officially a master ocean bender. So long as you agree to never bring that thing near my city made of water ever again."

{{champion:16}} "Oh boss, I am so proud of you."

{{champion:37}} "..."

{{champion:150}} "Oh Sona, I know, I know. Well, time to go find someplace a little warmer than this frozen wasteland."

_**Meanwhile:**_

{{champion:75}} "Alright, my superior dog nose tells me that the Eldertar was right on this earth halfpipe not too long ago."

{{champion:96}} "It appears we missed him. Well, what say you and I go back for some Tea?"

{{champion:75}} "Hang on, I hear a strange rumbling noise. It's almost like a-"
_"Gets flattened by giant rolling stone."_

{{champion:96}} "Oh dear, you seem to be in a spot of trouble."

{{champion:75}} "Why is it that I can never get no satisfaction. This is all the monarchy's fault. If people didn't just blindly follow the royalty like some sheep. I wouldn't have been exiled. From now on, no more monarchy. Now someone please help me."

{{champion:12}} "We can't. Since you are the prince, we have had to follow you. But with no monarchy, none of us really like you and wish you a wonderful time alone."

{{champion:75}} "**INFERNAL ALISTAR, YOU COME BACK!** Ok, I take it all back. We need the monarchy, or at least I do. Come back and rescue me."

{{champion:12}} "You are lucky I get paid a lot for this."
_"Headbutts boulder away."_

{{champion:41}} **"MY ORANGES, AGAIN! WHY CAN'T SOMEONE GIMME SOME PAINTED BLACK SHELTER FROM THIS GIANT ROLLING STONE THAT HAS BECOME A REAL BEAST OF BURDEN."**

{{champion:75}} "Turns out I can't blame all my problems on the privileged system and those who abuse it. Who knew? Well, back to the ship. Our hunt continues."

**BEYOND THE VOID: UPDATE 5/30/16**

Greetings, 

If you missed the the heads up from last week's episode, it's alright. Basically, there is going to be no episode this week since I am taking this weekend and next weekend to perfect the season finale. Many of you have questions as to whether this story will stay or not during season 2, and the answer is the story will continue for as long as it can (or until I get bored). So, I am sorry for any inconvenience I might have caused and thank you for taking your time every week to come here and read both Dellron and I's stories. 


Now, for season 2 to be green lit, Dellron has to approve it. 

To Dellron: You can take as much time as you need to... just let me know by replying back to me when you might have your decision. 

Thank you all and hope you're having a fun memorial day!!

Sorry for replying so late, been a hectic week.
You don't need my permission to do this. I'm not gonna stop you from doing what you are doing. You seem to enjoy writing these and people seem to enjoy reading them.

So go ahead, make season two. Make as many seasons as you want man. You do you, regardless of what I or anyone else says.

You're supposed to be my boss lol. Like everything is under one "Dellron Universe"... so that's why I asked for permission. However, I do need help deciding when to release this season 2... I am thinking october (so that it runs like a tv show), but I might lose people... any thoughts?

lol when I move my arm just under the surface of the water it creates this really cool wave effect and makes me fill powerful

also if i drop my phone charger in the water everything around it gets electrocuted

CULGRADULASHUNS UR A MASTER WATER BENDER!!!

Thats my hilarious King Dellron

EDIT*

When i make a funny post and get 2 upvotes it gives me this giddy effect and makes me fill really powerful!!

You are an expert congrats! Now get the **HEC**arim away from me and my city

get it heck-arim
Not playing mid this week lol
Why not? It's going to be nothing but noob Zeds.
Except with my luck all the noobs end up on my team and the good ones who didnt take the time to buy him end up on the other team.
Do what I did, change your main to adc and whine on the forums. Well, until Riot gives Zed a ranged AA because we all know Riot is secretly full of Zed mains.
"secretly"
Just play lulu and make all the first time Zeds give up for good

Have an absolutely amazing day!!! <3 you all!

oh, I always thought that the champion rotation updated on Mondays because that's when the article is released and that's when they say "Champion rotation now live."
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Time for all the wannabes that want to play Zed{{champion:238}}
Time to go mid lane and show them the ways of trollpole
Time for me to enjoy the free lane.  Noob {{champion:238}} = fed me.  :D
Lel watch for the mains, they'll blend in with the first timers and tear you apart.
As a Zed player i am sad because all the feed that see....{{item:3070}}

**The Fish and the Shark**
{{champion:105}} Come here you foul beast!
{{champion:421}} Why do you want me so bad?
{{champion:105}} You're a shark right?
{{champion:421}} No- well, technically I am a land shark...
{{champion:105}} How would you like a  job?
{{champion:421}} What kind of job?
{{champion:105}} Oh nothing too hard...
_Puts a leash around her neck_
{{champion:421}} What the actual hell dude!
{{champion:105}} NEW SKIN HERE I COME!!!!
{{champion:421}} .....
{{champion:6}} to be kidding me

Not enough bans for this free week

#The Arcade
_Episode 3: The tale of people under_
{{champion:120}} "Hello and welcome to the Arcade, the show were we do things so we don't have 3 episodes." "Last time we had to abandon the news station to save someone. So we won't be going over the free champ rotation and other things."
{{champion:21}} "Wait we aren't?! BUT THATS OUR THING!"
{{champion:120}} "Not today apparently."
{{champion:92}} "I feel like I'm just going to be toxic. I guess I wont be here then."
{{champion:120}} "But we need a entire team of heroes like some sort of RPG!"
{{item:2140}} "I may be of assistance."
{{champion:120}} "Who are you?"
{{item:2140}} "It's me. Your best friend..."
{{champion:238}} "~~SANSSSSSSSSSSSS! DO YOU WANNA HAVE A BAD TOM?!~~ Zed. A obligatory ninja character."
{{champion:120}} "_who the fuck is "sanssssss"?_ Oh cool. **QUE THE YOU HAVE A NEW PARTY MEMBER THING**"
{{champion:223}} "I'm here also. Just waiting to get level 6."
{{champion:120}} "Shut up Tahm no one cares"
{{champion:223}}{{item:3070}}
{{champion:92}} "Ok can we just get moving"
**_SEVERAL HOURS LATER.._**
{{champion:21}} "Ok, how did a weird purple place with ninjas and catfish... TAKE US TO THIS?!"
{{item:2139}} "The final boss fortress." "Owned by Final Boss Veigar. _and battle boss blitzcrank_"
{{champion:120}} "Oh cool we can fight the final boss now"
{{champion:238}} "But first everyone gets hot ~~cats~~ dogs."
{{champion:75}} "WHAT ARE YOU LOOKING AT?!"
{{champion:120}} "Oh hey Infernal Nasus." "I think Zed meant the food Hot dog."
{{champion:75}} "Oh, ok." "I'm just going to leave now."
{{champion:238}} _gives everyone in the "party" hot dogs_ "Ok lets just enter this thing."
LATER INSIDE VEIGARS FORTRESS..
{{champion:120}} "Man this is boring"
{{champion:21}} "Ikr"
{{champion:45}} "NOT SO FAST! _wow I'm talking like Rengar now_"
{{champion:53}} "YOU. WILL. HAVE. TO. FIGHT. ME. NOW." "IT. WILL. BE. LIKE. THAT. ONE. BATTLE. IN. UNDERTALE. WITH. THE. ROBOT."
{{champion:120}} "Whatever, its time to die Blitzcrank!"
_metal crusher starts playing_
{{champion:120}} "WHOA WHY IS EVERYONE BLACK AND WHITE"
{{champion:238}} "That's racist."
{{champion:53}} "YOU TOTALLY DONT HAVE TO GET ME TO LOOK FOR A MIRROR BEHIND ME TO WIN"
{{champion:120}} "Blitzcrank there is a mirror behind you."
{{champion:53}} "I HATE MIRRORS."
{{champion:53}} "I ONLY LIKE BATTERIES"
{{champion:120}} "Ok then there is a battery."
{{champion:53}} "WHAT WHERE?!"
{{champion:120}} _flips switch_ "Heh."
{{champion:53}} "LOOKS LIKE TEAM ROCKET IS BLASTING OFF AGAIN"
{{champion:120}} "Who?"
{{champion:53}} "I'VE BEEN WATCHING TO MUCH POKEMON" _blows up_
**Final fantasy victory music plays**
{{champion:45}} "WELL DONE HEROES!" "YOU GET YOUR PRIZE AFTER YOU DEFEAT ME IN THE NEXT EPISODE! NYEH HEH HEH!"

**_TO BE CONTINUED MUSIC_**
Well, the dude who said he'd kill himself if Zed didn;t go on free rot is going to be happy..
On a more serious note, why Lucian? He's already extremely popular? Not knocking on Riot's decision, just curious.
At least i can finally try the korean build{{champion:236}}
You mean the only build haha xD
What makes popularity a reason to not have Lucian here? Seeing a popular champion makes you want to try him, but who buys a champion they've never played?
so they can see what to patch, lucian or the items
Dumb question: Shouldn't Taliyah be available? This is the 2nd week since she was released.
It has always been the 3rd week after release that new champions are free.

Always is a strong word, and you made me look it up. As of Fiora its been every third week (http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Free_champion_rotation#New_champions), I just haven't noticed apparently.

ACK! Sorry, I didn't realize I used "always". (It's a bad habit of mine. Ugh.)
I meant it has been 3 weeks for a while now.
It's all good man. Glad we have our facts straight :)

*looks at {{champion:238}}/{{champion:236}} *
